articles.description: England defender Eric Dier has admitted players are being put into very 'difficult' situations after he was questioned about issues surrounding Qatar's hosting of the World Cup.
articles.content: Eric Dier has vowed to learn more about the political circumstances marring the upcoming World Cup in Qatar as he admitted players featuring in the tournament 'can't hide' from the humanitarian issue… [+2804 chars]

articles.author: Jack Wilkinson
articles.title: Arsenal Women 2-3 Manchester United Women: Alessia Russo seals stunning late comeback - Sky Sports
articles.description: Alessia Russo sealed a remarkable comeback in stoppage-time as Man Utd stunned Arsenal 3-2 to inflict a first defeat of the season on the WSL leaders.
articles.content:
Alessia Russo sealed a remarkable comeback in stoppage-time as Manchester United stunned Arsenal 3-2 to inflict a first defeat of the season on the WSL leaders.
